content: Can you provide a joke about a cat in a format suitable for a stand-up comedy routine? Bonus points if the joke includes references to popular memes or viral videos involving cats.

Sure, here's a stand-up comedy style joke featuring a cat:

---

You ever notice how cats have this innate ability to act like they're royalty? I mean, they strut around like they own the place, right? And we just go along with it! It's like living with a tiny, furry monarch. 

I was watching one of those viral cat videos the other day—you know, the ones that take over the internet faster than a Wi-Fi password at a coffee shop. This cat was chasing a laser pointer, and it suddenly hit me: cats are basically the embodiment of every internet meme ever. They're the original "can't even" before it was cool!

But there's one meme that really captures the essence of cats: the classic "Grumpy Cat." You remember Grumpy Cat, right? Always looking like someone just told him he's out of treats. I swear, if Grumpy Cat could talk, he'd be the perfect stand-up comedian. Just imagine him up here on stage, looking at the audience, saying, "I had a purrfect day... until I realized I was out of naps."

And let's not forget the famous "Keyboard Cat!" That cat's got more talent in his paws than I do in my whole body. I'm convinced that somewhere out there, there's a Cat Grammys, and Keyboard Cat has swept the awards every year since 2009.

So next time you see a cat, just remember, they're not just pets—they're meme royalty, viral video stars, and the ultimate stand-up comedians of the animal kingdom. Just don't expect them to laugh at *your* jokes. They're way too cool for that!

---

Hope that brings a smile!
